name: Meet Metris
description:
Meet "Meet Metris", Brazil's Exotic Puzzle Game.

Take a trip to Brazil with this calm and relaxing, easy while addictive falling blocks Puzzle game, With an entire soundtrack composed based on classic Brazilian songs. 

Put one block upside another one with the same color and you're good! While question mark blocks are the most crazy thing ever, be cautious with them.

Controls:
Arrow Keys (Keyboard)
Screen (Touch)
